formula: Equals n^2*tau(n), where tau(n) = A000005(n) = number of divisors of n. - _Jon Perry_, Aug 28 2005

G.f.: Sum_{k>=1} k^2*x^k*(1 + x^k)/(1 - x^k)^3. - _Ilya Gutkovskiy_, Oct 24 2018

G.f.: Sum_{n >= 1} q^(n^2)*( n^4*q^(3*n) - n^2*(n^2 + 4*n - 2)*q^(2*n) - n^2*(n^2 - 4*n - 2)*q^n + n^4 )/(1 - q^n)^3 - apply the operator q*d/dq twice to equation 5 in Arndt and set x = 1. - _Peter Bala_, Jan 21 2021
